1370: Eremboldus moved to Die Camp.A.8 after marriage.
Got married to Brundonis at age 35 in 1370.
Had a son with Brundonis, Eremboldus, at age 35.
1373: Had a daughter with Brundonis, Breghlent, at age 38.
1374: Had a son with Brundonis, Ludingus, at age 39.
1375: Had a son with Brundonis, Amilius, at age 40.
1376: Had a son with Brundonis, Alebrando, at age 41.
1377: Had a son with Brundonis, Gheuardus, at age 42.
1378: Had a daughter with Brundonis, Breghlent, at age 43.
1379: Lost his wife Brundonis while she was giving birth to Moerseil in 1379.
Lost son Gheuardus when Gheuardus was 3 years old.
Became caretaker of Eremboldus, Breghlent, Ludingus, Amilius, Alebrando, Breghlent, Moerseil at age 45.
1387: Lost son Ludingus when Ludingus was 14 years old.
